basic.description: This course is designed to provide qualified upper-division majors in special education an opportunity to undertake an independent and original research project. May be repeated to a maximum of nine thesis hours with instructor approval.
basic.subject: EEX
basic.title: Honors Work in Special Education

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Admission to the honors program. Corequisites: EDF 5481 or EEX 5931 or equivalent.
